amendment.description: Amendment sought to make an across the board cut of 5% to all funding accounts in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to an across the board cut of 5% to all funding accounts in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 252 (Roll no. 623).
